author: cnbc.com
title: Nelnet Board Approves Dividend
text:
LINCOLN, Neb., Feb. 5, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Nelnet, Inc. (NYSE: NNI) today announced the company's Board of Directors declared a first quarter cash dividend on the company's outstanding shares of Class A common stock and Class B common stock of $0.16 per share. The dividend will be paid on Thursday, March 15, 2018, to shareholders of record at the close of business on Thursday, March 1, 2018.
Learn more about Nelnet at www.nelnet.com .
(code #: nnif)

SOURCE Nelnet
